ygData.subject: Medium bronze platemail.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... any info on wich zone and wich mob to find some would help, thanks
ygData.messageBody:
> I am in the search of some medium bronze platemail, ive seen a ton of large
> and small bronze(small from unrest, and large from najena) but everyone i talk
> to has no idea where to get medium....are we mid sized races getting jipped?
> heh

any info on wich zone and wich mob to find some would help, thanks
